00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Options;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Options - Change user options.
00023 
00024 =cut
00025 
00026 use strict;
00027 use warnings;
00028 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00029 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00030 use WeBWorK::Utils qw(cryptPassword dequote);
00031 use WeBWorK::Localize;
00032 
00033 
00034 
00035 sub body {
00036     my ($self) = @_;
00037     my $r = $self->r;
00038     my $db = $r->db;
00039     my $authz = $r->authz;
00040     
00041     my $userID = $r->param("user");
00042     my $User = $db->getUser($userID);
00043     die "record not found for user '$userID'." unless defined $User;
00044     
00045     my $eUserID = $r->param('effectiveUser');
00046     my $EUser = $db->getUser($eUserID); # checked
00047     die "record not found for effective user '$eUserID'." unless defined $EUser;
00048     
00049     my $user_name = $User->first_name . " " . $User->last_name;
00050     my $e_user_name = $EUser->first_name . " " . $EUser->last_name;
00051     
00052     my $changeOptions = $r->param("changeOptions");
00053     my $currP = $r->param("currPassword");
00054     my $newP = $r->param("newPassword");
00055     my $confirmP = $r->param("confirmPassword");
00056     my $newA = $r->param("newAddress");
00057         
00058     print CGI::start_form(-method=>"POST", -action=>$r->uri);
00059     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00060     
00061     print CGI::h2($r->maketext("Change Password"));
00062     
00063     if ($changeOptions and ($currP or $newP or $confirmP)) {
00064         
00065         if ($authz->hasPermissions($userID, "change_password")) {
00066             
00067             my $Password = eval {$db->getPassword($User->user_id)}; # checked
00068             warn $r->maketext("Can't get password record for user '[_1]': [_2]",$userID,$@) if $@ or not defined $Password;
00069             
00070             my $EPassword = eval {$db->getPassword($EUser->user_id)}; # checked
00071             warn $r->maketext("Can't get password record for effective user '[_1]': [_2]",$eUserID,$@) if $@ or not defined $EPassword;
00072             
00073             if (crypt($currP, $Password->password) eq $Password->password) {
00074                 if ($newP or $confirmP) {
00075                     if ($newP eq $confirmP) {
00076                         $EPassword->password(cryptPassword($newP));
00077                         eval { $db->putPassword($EPassword) };
00078                         if ($@) {
00079                             print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00080                                 CGI::p($r->maketext("Couldn't change [_1]'s password: [_2]",$e_user_name,$@)),
00081                             );
00082                         } else {
00083                             print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
00084                                 CGI::p($r->maketext("[_1]'s password has been changed.",$e_user_name)),
00085                             );
00086                         }
00087                     } else {
00088                         print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00089                             CGI::p(
00090                                 $r->maketext("The passwords you entered in the [_1] and [_2] fields don't match. Please retype your new password and try again.", CGI::b($r->maketext("[_1]'s New Password",$e_user_name)), CGI::b($r->maketext("Confirm [_1]'s New Password",$e_user_name))) 
00091                             ),
00092                         );
00093                     }
00094                 } else {
00095                     print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00096                         CGI::p($r->maketext("[_1]'s new password cannot be blank.",$e_user_name)),
00097                     );
00098                 }
00099             } else {
00100                 print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00101                     CGI::p($r->maketext("The password you entered in the [_1] field does not match your current password. Please retype your current password and try again.", CGI::b($r->maketext("[_1]'s Current Password",$user_name)))
00102                     ),
00103                 );
00104             }
00105             
00106         } else {
00107             print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00108                 CGI::p($r->maketext("You do not have permission to change your password.")))
00109                     unless $changeOptions and ($currP or $newP or $confirmP); # avoid double message
00110         }
00111         
00112     }
00113     
00114     if ($authz->hasPermissions($userID, "change_password")) {
00115         print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00116             CGI::Tr({},
00117                 CGI::td($r->maketext("[_1]'s Current Password",$user_name)),
00118                 CGI::td(CGI::password_field(-name=>"currPassword")),
00119             ),
00120             CGI::Tr({},
00121                 CGI::td($r->maketext("[_1]'s New Password",$e_user_name)),
00122                 CGI::td(CGI::password_field(-name=>"newPassword")),
00123             ),
00124             CGI::Tr({},
00125                 CGI::td($r->maketext("Confirm [_1]'s New Password",$e_user_name)),
00126                 CGI::td(CGI::password_field(-name=>"confirmPassword")),
00127             ),
00128         );
00129     } else {
00130         print CGI::p($r->maketext("You do not have permission to change your password."));
00131     }
00132     
00133     print CGI::h2($r->maketext("Change Email Address"));
00134     
00135     if ($changeOptions and $newA) {
00136         if ($authz->hasPermissions($userID, "change_email_address")) {
00137             
00138             my $oldA = $EUser->email_address;
00139             $EUser->email_address($newA);
00140             eval { $db->putUser($EUser) };
00141             if ($@) {
00142                 $EUser->email_address($oldA);
00143                 print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00144                     CGI::p($r->maketext("Couldn't change your email address: [_1]",$@)),
00145                 );
00146             } else {
00147                 print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithoutError"},
00148                     CGI::p($r->maketext("Your email address has been changed.")),
00149                 );
00150             }
00151             
00152         } else {
00153             print CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"},
00154                 CGI::p($r->maketext("You do not have permission to change email addresses.")),
00155             );
00156         }
00157     }
00158     
00159     if ($authz->hasPermissions($userID, "change_email_address")) {
00160         print CGI::table({class=>"FormLayout"},
00161             CGI::Tr({},
00162                 CGI::td($r->maketext("[_1]'s Current Address",$e_user_name)),
00163                 CGI::td($EUser->email_address),
00164             ),
00165             CGI::Tr({},
00166                 CGI::td($r->maketext("[_1]'s New Address",$e_user_name)),
00167                 CGI::td(CGI::textfield(-name=>"newAddress", -text=>$newA)),
00168             ),
00169         );
00170     } else {
00171         print CGI::p($r->maketext("You do not have permission to change email addresses."))
00172             unless $changeOptions and $newA; # avoid double message
00173     }
00174     
00175     print CGI::br();
00176     print CGI::submit("changeOptions", "Change User Options");
00177     print CGI::end_form();
00178     
00179     return "";
00180 }
00181 
00182 1;
